attributes.action: Congratulate the elected minority SNP government of Scotland through the First Minister, AlexSalmond
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From reports the PM and his Chancellor have refused to acknowledge the elected government in Scotland.  This is a disgraceful way for any government to act and is not only a slight to the SNP but a slight to the people who voted.  Their arrogance defies description and reflects badly on the democratic procees.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
